item.name: Le Noir's Greatsword
entries: This long forgotten sword confers to its attuned wielder unimaginable power.
It looks like a +1 sword, however after speaking its command word it reveals its true nature and shape
The sword has 3 charges. When the sword is in its real shape and hits an enemy, the wielder can spend one charge and deal additional {@damage 4d6} necrotic damage.
When a living creature is slain by this sword, the sword faintly glows in red
The sword regains all unexpended charges at midnight
item.reqAttune: by somebody levelling up as a Hexblade for the first time

item.name: Neoaxe
entries: While holding this battleaxe, you can spend one of its charges and cast the {@spell blinding smite} spell as part of the attack.
The axe sheds bright blue-light in a 10-foot radius and dim light in an additional 10-foot radius.

item.name: Neosword
entries: While holding this greatsword, you can spend one of its charges and cast the {@spell branding smite} spell as part of the attack.
The axe sheds bright purple-light in a 10-foot radius and dim light in an additional 10-foot radius.
